explains: adv. 本质地，内在地，固有地
wordGroup: intrinsically safe 本质安全；真正安全

sentences.en: Sometimes I wonder if people are intrinsically evil.
sentences.cn: 有时我怀疑人是否生来就是邪恶的。

sentences.en: The central state, though often very rich and very populous, was intrinsically fragile.
sentences.cn: 尽管中央帝国非常富足且人口稠密，但本质上还很脆弱。

sentences.en: Constable was extraordinarily modern in believing that nothing could be intrinsically ugly.
sentences.cn: 康斯特布尔很前卫地相信没有天生丑陋的东西。
